channel.title: Hyperion Giverights Command
channel.description: I have a giverights command on my server and it works for people without spaces in their name but say if you name is like this Skizard FTW it just says the player cannot be found. Is there a way to make it recognize the space in the name and make it set the player right?

item.title: Hyperion Giverights Command
item.dc:creator: @xVhincex xVhincex
item.description:
@xVhincex wrote:


idk how your give rights command work but all you need is that .replace method thing

example: ::giveadmin Skizard_FTW
it will replace the _ with a space

idk how your give rights command work but all you need is that .replace method thing

example: ::giveadmin Skizard_FTW
it will replace the _ with a space

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Giverights Command
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Just type the first part of your name.

Read full topic
